column1: The two types of sun rays that can injure the skin are ultraviolet A (UVA) and ultraviolet B (UVB).
- Sunglasses that block UVA and UVB rays, for anyone above age 1.
It is important not to rely on sunscreen alone for sun protection.
If your skin is sensitive to the chemicals in sunscreen products, choose a mineral sunscreen such as zinc oxide or titanium dioxide.
Sunscreens are safe for most toddlers and children.
